bookCover.coverDescription: An Interactive book on addition for lower grade students.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: Addition is the process of adding two or more than two numbers from which we get a total sum from adding those numbers. The addition of two single digit numbers can be done by using the fingers of the hand. Carry method is used to add two numbers with more than one digit.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio

tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback:
It is the correct answer.
 
Explanation:
 
To correctly add the numbers first count the number or numbers before the addition sign, then again count the numbers after the addition sign. Now, add them both and you will get your correct answer.
1 + 1 = 2

overallFeedback.feedback: Well done ! It is the correct answer.

params.question: Add the numbers from the above pictures and choose the right answer from below.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Addition of one digit number.

 

To understand the concept of addition of one (1) digit number, we could take the help of objects as well as numbers too.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: If you have one chocolate and I gave you two more chocolates, then how many chocolates will you have? The answer is you will have three chocolates with you. Here, the "+" sign is for addition and "=" is for equals to sign.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: We could also use just numbers in addition like when we take the number two and add it with the number four, then we will get the number six. In maths, we write this like "2+4=6".

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: Also, when you add a certain number with zero (0), the answer will be that number only. Like if you add a zero (0) chocolates with five chocolates, then the answer will be five chocolates only. This same case goes for the addition of two digits numbers also.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Addition of two digit numbers

 

We have already learned that addition means putting numbers together like how if you have two balls and someone gave you three more balls, then you have five balls altogether. But what to do when you have to add bigger numbers or lets say how to add bigger numbers. Lets say you have 54 marbles and you buy 21 extra marbles, so in total how many marbles do you have now?

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio

tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback:
It is the correct answer.
 
Explanation:
 
Add the numbers in ones unit. Then add the numbers in tens unit, you will get your correct answer. Sometimes while adding the numbers in the ones unit, if you get the sum as two digit numbers then you have to carry the number over to the tens units and you should add that number with rest of the numbers in tens unit to get your correct answer.
12 + 23 = 35

overallFeedback.feedback: Amazing ! It is the correct answer.

metadata.title: Q5 Add one and two digit numbers
Addition of one and two digit numbers

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
A Number Line

 

A number line has numbers on a straight line.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
For example,
If you had purchased 4 books yesterday and today, you decided to buy 5 more books, how many books in total do you have now?

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: To find the answer you must add the two numbers together. A number line can help.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio
Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: The number you stop on is the answer. So using number line we figured out that 4 books plus 5 books equals 9 books.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback:
It is the correct answer.
 
Explanation:
 
To add on a number line, count on. Start at 4 and count on 1. The result is 5.
Thus the addition sentence is:
4 + 1 = 5

overallFeedback.feedback: Bravo ! It is the correct answer.
